data.name: Data Visualization Dashboard
data.description: For users who want to visualize and study trends on data with tools

accomplishments: Developed a web application for users who want to visualize and study trends on the data they upload or retrieve.
Allows users to login, save personal settings, and retrieve 3 data sets from a MySQL database.
Features a variety of tools, including table, bar, line, pie charts, and an interactive map that highlights states in color.

data.name: CS:GO Stat Tracker
data.description: Vue.js application to allow users to see a player's in game stats

accomplishments: Developed web application displaying 7 realtime profile career stats using Tracker Network API.
Utilized Vue.js Single File Component System to easily reuse and organize components.
Used vue-router to handle 2 routes between the home page and show profile page.
Handled API requests in the front-end and back-end using Axios.
Made use of Node.js config.env to handle production and development enviroment separately

data.name: Virtual Assistant
data.description: Research project testing how users learn from chatbot assistance

accomplishments: Built interactive chatbot using JavaScript, Node.js, HTML5, and CSS3 displaying over 10 financial tips to users in chat.

data.name: Portfolio Website
data.description: Built on a Digital Ocean Droplet needing server configurations

accomplishments: Hosted on a Digital Ocean Droplet using NGINX as reverse proxy for security and subdomain handling.
Automates the renewal of an HTTPS Certificate using Let's Encrypt on Ubuntu 20.
Uses Node.js for the server side and utilizes Pug.js as a template engine for serving HTML pages.
Designed and implented from scratch using the framework Bootstrap 4.
